entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming northeast 30 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
